page.title: 06YOUTH GROUPS AT TORTHORWALD
page.content: {Brownies} The brownies are held on a Monday night in Mousald School from 5.30 _ 7.00pm. You have to pay 20p. People can come and watch you if they like. It is alot of fun. You go lots of brownie camping holidays. We have 24 girls in our pack. {Guides Girl Guides is lots of fun. It is held in the local hall every Tuesday from 6.30 _ 8.30pm. There are four patrols: rose, primrose, daffodil, snowdrop. We play games, sing, dance and learn badges e.g. firefighter. We have 24 Guides in our patrol.
